data.description: Watch out for a smelly speedrunner and their brand new PB.

field.description: Eeep! Another speedrunner!

data.description: Snacker smells tasty new PB, stay just there!

field.description: Mmmm...lovely!

data.description: Oi! My precious rank.

field.description: Will you stop that! It took me ages to climb the leaderboard.

data.description: This be a new PB!

field.description: Touch it if you dare...

data.description: chomp... munch... Nabnut likes PBs!

field.description: I'll see you in the spring for a rematch!

data.description: Ahoy there! I'm cap'n Blubber, an' I lost me rank when

field.description: Arr, take me spot, but I'm off to practice, practice, practice!

data.description: Yummy!

field.description: Croctus liked that!
You look faster already! Not sure how I can tell, but it's true!

data.description: Greetings, O solid run!

field.description: Beat this time and you can take this infernal thing that's stuck under me!

data.description: Grrr...

field.description: Cheeky bird needs PB bopped!

data.description: Grrr...

field.description: Cheeky bird needs PB bopped!

data.description: They're back! Get them Flibbits

field.description: Blub... You're too fast for us Flibbits, take our leaderboard spot!

data.description: Bzzz... The speedrunner!

field.description: They're after Grunty's gold splits, sting them Zubbas!

data.description: Summon all the hidden rings of the ancients to beat this PB!
This PB is mighty fine!
Oooh! PBs for Dingpot... I like PBs!

field.description: Slposh on in and I'll fire you up to the top of the leaderboard!

data.description: Oh, here you are at last!

field.description: I've been waiting months to give you this PB!

data.description: Noooo! I've had that time a thousand years.

field.description: Well done mortal!

data.description: Grrr... greeny must have cheated!

field.description: Mr. Vile not acknowledging PB!

data.description: You've activated a Magic PB!

field.description: Find two the same time to create a short cut to the top of the leaderboard!

data.description: Ahhh... lovely PB!

field.description: Trunker feels great!

data.description: You may have won, but soon you'll see!

field.description: I'll make sure that's your last PB!

data.description: Bzzarrgh!

field.description: I calculate my chances of stopping them are now minimal...

data.description: Please help me!

field.description: Because if I die, your PB will smell of dead fish.

data.description: If you try to steal my time, you'll be seeing my enormous foot close up!

field.description: OOO-OOO-AAAHHH! My poor PB!

data.description: It's Terrible! They beat Targitzan's favorite priceless PB!

field.description: Those thieving little...

data.description: Alert! Intruders detected! Activate the tintops...

field.description: Ulp..Intruder has defeated the tintops. Grunty's treasure has been lost...

data.description: Ahem. I believe it states quite clearly in the worker's guidelines that bears are not to be let onto the leaderboard.

field.description: Oh well, looks like my welding days are over...

data.description: Shiver me timbers!

field.description: A bear stole me glory... looked a bit like you PB'd!

data.description: Woo! Have you no sympathy beating a poor blind fish?

field.description: Curses! Things seem to have gone belly up!

data.description: Brawk! That was a fine run!

field.description: But my wings are still stiff from spending so long in that cage!

data.description: Klungo clever, learn lotsss. Hasss learnt of new PB!

field.description: Ssstupid ssspeedrunner bopped poor Klungo!

data.description: Bleep! New best time!

field.description: Waz I of azziztance? Bleep!

data.description: Take a look at this brand new PB!

field.description: It's got loads of features!

data.description: You got through the Lava World?!

field.description: ...you're coming back for me, right?

data.description: Well, really!

field.description: That was a brand new PB - have you any idea how much they cost these days?!

data.description: Ah... At last! The PB delivery bear!

field.description: I don't wanna compete against that... I'll go get McJiggy's instead.

data.description: I can hardly believe my eyes!

field.description: You really sent that witch packin'!

data.description: Past or present, you always win...

field.description: But I will always try again!

data.description: Great flying!

field.description: You're even faster than me!

data.description: You really showed your flying skill!

field.description: All that boosting made me ill!

data.description: Klungo clever, learn lotsss. Hasss learnt of new PB!

field.description: You ssshould ssspeedrun Klungo's game!

data.description: Oi, ya slipped right under my nose!

field.description: I'll get ya next time, punk!

data.description: Not bad, kid!

field.description: You're almost as fast as me!
